summary.para: The size of the structure, in bytes.
The control's miscellaneous status bits that can also be returned by . See for more information.
The control's view status that can also be returned by . See for more information.
A unique identifier for control-defined events.
A unique identifier for control-defined properties.

The control's activation policy that can also be returned by . If all the bits of dwPointerActivationPolicy are set, then the IPointerInactive interface may not be supported. The container should to obtain the interface pointer in the standard manner.
